structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.text: Any person who violates any of the provisions of KRS 268.580 shall be fined not less than ten dollars ($10) nor more than one hundred dollars ($100).
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 29, effective July 13, 1984. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2380b-49, 2380b-53.
